content: skånsk vinter sizes 1 2 3 woman´s s m l with a finished circ of 18 20 22 cm wool socks are stretchy and size 2 fits me snuggly i have a foot circ of 23 5cm needles circular or double pointed 2 mm gauge after blocking 32 st and 46 row in st st and patt yarn sandnes sisu fingering weight superwash 80% wool 20% nylon 175m/50 g these socks are perfect for the windy and rainy winters that we get here in the very south of sweden they are knit on small needles and a slightly thicker sock yarn for a sturdy and wind resistant fabric the sock is knit cuff down in a simple knit and purl pattern with a heel flap and gusset any method could be used knitting this pattern double pointed needles dpns short circular needle magic loop if you are using dpns there is no need for markers arrange the needles so they meet where your markers would be placed 2 2 3 balls row 2 rs sl1 k 14 16 17 ssk k1 pattern begins row 3 ws sl1 p to one sts before gap p2tog p1 co 64 72 80 sts on 2mm us 0 needles row 4 rs sl1 k to one sts before gap with a german twisted cast on ssk k1 https //www youtube com/shorts/tiic5mpk wak or preferred stretchy co repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all the sts you now have 22 26 28 heel ribbing sts work in 1x1 ribbing for 15 rnds or as gusset desired begin working in the round again leg set up round pick up and k 16 18 20 sts start working in patt along the row of slipped sts pm work top of foot in pattern as established round 1 & round 1 & 2 k all sts 2 k all sts round 3 k1 p1 pm pick up and round 3 k1 p1 to end of round k 16 18 20 sts along the row of slipped sts k 11 13 14 sts place bor marker if work until leg measures 11 11 5 12 cm you are working with dpns simply arrange from co or preferred length ending on a the sts so that the needles meet where round 3 you would otherwise place the markers heel flap if you are using markers keep them in until you have worked the toe they indicate turn work so ws is facing heel flap is where the decr for the toe are placed knit back and forth over half your sts 32 36 40 only round 1 decr round k to 4 sts before m k2tog k2 sl m work in patt for top of foot all sl sts are sl pw wyib sl m k2 ssk k to bor 2 sts decr row 1 sl1 p to end of row round 2 k to m sl m work in patt for top of foot sl m
